forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning, becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
